channel.title: Npcs within area
channel.description:
Uhh just a quick question, and how to...
I made an area in which people can go and fight monsters, but i don't want the monsters to appear until you pass a certain Y coordinate. I don't know if its possible, but if someone knows, it would be greatly appreciated!
If not possible, i'll just go the regular way...
